channel.title: 6 Point Shield From Scratch
channel.description:
I made this shield from scratch in about 30 minutes, so tell me what you think.
Front: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/6PointShieldFront.jpg[/img]
Left: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/6PointShieldLeft.jpg[/img]
Right: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/6PointShieldRight.jpg[/img]
Top: [IMG]http://i349.photobucket.com/albums/q398/sk4r3dpkz/6PointShieldTop.jpg[/img]
Credits: 100% To Me
Any ideas on how to improve it? Any criticism would be appreciated, but please don't flame. =]
Also if enough people like it, I may release it, but I doubt anyone will want this in their servers.

item.title: 6 Point Shield From Scratch
item.dc:creator: @senorlemon senorlemon
item.description:
@senorlemon wrote:

the sides arent exactly even with the other one. its clearly evident on the top points. the two points join the middle at two areas that arent close to lining up. other than that its great. add some more detail.

Read full topic
